#summary What needs to be done

== What needs to be done (ordered by descending probability of implementation) ==
  * better process module
  * test before using Cast()
  * Thorough testing of reuse_context
  * Thorough testing of sqlite
  * file copying without `mmap_*` (until mmap works on windows)
  * mmap on windows
  * ~~fcgi on windows~~
  * zlib (not before Binary datatype is standardized)
  * libxml

  * pgsql support
